data.title: Trump administration looks to supercharge robotics industry, Politico reports
data.description: Leaders in the robotics industry say that to strengthen AI, companies also need a plan for robots. The White House appears to be listening. Yasmin Khorram, economic policy reporter for Politico, joins CBS News to discuss her article on the topic.
data.keywords: Economy, Donald Trump, Robot, Howard Lutnick, Trump Administration, Artificial Intelligence
